QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: CIM_SAPAvailableForElement conveys the semantics of a Service Access Point that is available for a ManagedElement. When CIM_SAPAvailableForElement is not instantiated, then the SAP is assumed to be generally available. If instantiated, the SAP is available only for the associated ManagedElements. For example, a device might provide management access through a URL. This association allows the URL to be advertised for the device.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The Service Access Point that is available.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The ManagedElement for which the SAP is available.
